title: Campbell's Broccoli Rice Casserole Recipe
description: This quick-cooking broccoli, cheese, and rice casserole is comforting and easy to make with a delicious, creamy sauce to bring everything together.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Dinner Campbell's Broccoli Rice Casserole 4.6 (278) 225 Reviews 49 Photos What makes this quick-cooking broccoli, cheese, and rice casserole really tasty is coating the broccoli and rice in a creamy sauce. Submitted by Campbell's Kitchen Updated on March 4, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 49 49 49 49 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 40 mins Total Time: 55 mins Servings: 12 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 12 servings ½ cup butter 1 large onion, chopped 1 (16 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli 1 ½ cups cooked regular long-grain white rice 1 (10.5 ounce) can Campbell's Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup (Regular or 98% Fat Free) 1 (8 fl oz) jar pasteurized process cheese sauce (like Cheez Whiz) ⅓ cup milk Directions Gather the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Heat butter in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Add onion and cook until tender-crisp, stirring occasionally. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Add broccoli to the skillet and cook until it's tender-crisp, stirring occasionally. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Stir in rice, condensed soup, cheese sauce, and milk. Cook and stir until cheese is melted. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Pour broccoli-rice mixture into a 2-quart shallow baking dish. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake in the preheated oven until the mixture is hot and bubbling, about 30 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 707 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 252 Calories 14g Fat 27g Carbs 6g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 12 Calories 252 % Daily Value * Total Fat 14g 18% Saturated Fat 8g 40% Cholesterol 37mg 12% Sodium 552mg 24% Total Carbohydrate 27g 10% Dietary Fiber 2g 8% Total Sugars 3g Protein 6g 12% Vitamin C 22mg 25% Calcium 108mg 8% Iron 1mg 7% Potassium 180mg 4% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Campbell's Broccoli Rice Casserole 01 of 49 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 49 Photo by  Kandis L 12/17/2023 It’s pretty easy to make, but it was very thick and bland to me. I think it needs more rice, and more liquid. The cheese sauce was a little overpowering. My husband loved it, because he had a pork chop with it, but I wasn’t crazy about it. 03 of 49 Photo by  PeppyRoe4471 01/24/2023 I used great value cheddar cheese sauce for dip just to try this recipe it worked really well and tastes better than I thought it would in want to try fresh cheese next time but great value is a good option 04 of 49 Photo by  grace honore 07/20/2021 Wonderful and easy. I added jalapeños and mozzarella cheese and it was great and ready 05 of 49 Photo by  Pree 06/15/2021 06 of 49 Photo by  Catherine Copeland 03/01/2021 07 of 49 Photo by  Lettie 01/23/2021 08 of 49 Photo by  mizzoumaynard 11/26/2020 09 of 49 Photo by  AALLISON 09/03/2020 10 of 49 Photo by  Eddie 06/03/2020 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Broccoli Rice Casserole by Minute Rice 18 Ratings Broccoli and Cauliflower Casserole 563 Ratings Broccoli Cheese Casserole 107 Ratings Broccoli and Cheese Casserole 56 Ratings Instant Pot® Cheddar, Broccoli, and Cauliflower Bake 1 Rating Broccoli-Corn Casserole 13 Ratings Vernita's Broccoli Casserole 44 Ratings Baked Green Vegetables 20 Ratings Creamy Broccoli and Cheese Casserole 54 Ratings Simply Potatoes® Easy Shepherd's Pie 43 Ratings Broccoli Casserole II 95 Ratings Thanksgiving Broccoli and Cheese Casserole 33 Ratings Green Rice II 24 Ratings Broccoli Casserole with Rice 415 Ratings Broccoli Cauliflower Casserole 165 Ratings Broccoli Cheese Layer Bake 34 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
